page.title: 09WROXALL: A NEWCOMER'S VIEW
page.content: {Mrs.Avloniti}and her husband came to live in the village in Dec.1984.They rent their house from Wroxall Abbey School, where she{teaches.}She enjoys living in the village,as she is fond of the country,and she likes being able to feel safe when out at night. Her neighbours are supportive,and and there is a good community spirit. The only amenity she (and many others) miss is a{'bus service. Every{Sunday}she gets up at around 9am-9.30am,and makes breakfast.Then she feeds the dog,and cat if it arrives.Next she cleans the house and walks the dog. At 11.30 she goes to karate in Shirley until 2pm.Then she goes to a{'takeaway',}or visits her parents.Then she comes home and does school work or watches TV. After her evening meal she goes out for a drink, then works until bedtime at 11pm.
